required.en: This is a required field, you must set a value before submitting the form.

integer.en: This is a integer field, you must set a valid value before submitting the form.

float.en: This is a float field, you must set a valid value before submitting the form.

email.en: This is a email field, you must set a value that contains a valid email address before submitting the form.

phone.en: This is a phone number field, you must set a valid value before submitting the form. The number must include the international prefix for example: +447123456789.

noXSS.en: This field failed XSS validation, please remove any HTML syntax.

form_validation_error_description.en: It looks like the current form has errors raised on the following fields: [% fields %]. Please first fix these before you re-submit.

cards_description.en: An overview of all users for Hazy Bar Clinic, please use the create button to add a new user or click on any existing user to edit.

create_modal_description.en: The following form allows you to create an existing supervisor user.

create_modal_error_description.en: The API request to create the user failed, please try again and if the issue persists then contact your local administrator.

create_modal_success_description.en: The API request to create the user ([% username %]) was successfull. Temporary Password Link [% password_link %].

edit_modal_description.en: The following form allows you to edit an existing supervisor user.

edit_modal_error_description.en: The API request to update the user failed, please try again and if the issue persists then contact your local administrator.

edit_modal_success_description.en: The API request to update the user ([% username %]) was successfull.

delete_modal_description.en: You are about to delete the following user, are you sure you would like to proceed with this action?

delete_modal_error_description.en: The API request to delete the user failed, please try again and if the issue persists then contact your local administrator.

delete_modal_success_description.en: The API request to delete the user ([% username %]) was successfull.

username_info.en: A text string that represents a username which has to be unique per environment, it cannot be changed after initial creation of the user.
